text: Peter Carey may mean: *Peter Carey (Australian rules footballer), Australian rules player for Glenelg *Peter Carey (English footballer) (born 1933), English footballer *Peter Carey (historian), British historian of south-east Asia *Peter Carey (novelist), Australian novelist *Peter Carey (umpire), Australian rules umpire *"Black Peter" Carey, a fictional character in The Adventure of Black Peter, a Sherlock Holmes story by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
title: Peter Carey
